text: @user Thanks for reaching out Darren. We are happy to go over this with you and provide further details and guidance. Please send us a DM - We are here to help! ^WL

@user Thanks for writing back Mike.  If purchasing cash from a TD branch and not using your card at an ATM the 3.5% would not apply.  Please send us a DM if you need further detail.  ^GF

@user Hello Taylor. We are terribly sorry for any inconvenience caused & want to help. Our international collect phone number is 1-416-983-5393. However we do have other options to contact us! To further discuss please DM us & an agent will assist. ^JO

@user Hello Mike & great question! In this case the amount withdrawn from your account will include a fee equal to 3.5% of the purchase amount after conversion to Canadian dollars. Please let us know if you have any additional questions or concerns. Thank you! ^JO

@user Hello we are very sorry to hear that this has been your experience. This is certainly not how we want you or your dad to feel-especially when celebrating your birthday! We want to learn more about this experience & welcome you to DM us.! Thank you. ^JO

@user Thanks for messaging back.  We would not use a withdrawal slip if you do not have a card but would be provided a receipt for the withdrawal.  If you do not have a card we would require ID to be presented to access the account.  ^GF

@user Thanks for reaching out Jeff.  That is a great question and we are just a little bit jealous.... There are a few different ways to cancel a Visa if you're out of the country.  Please send us a DM and we are happy to chat further.  ^GF

@user Hi Natasha we picked up your tweet. This is certainly not the type of experience we want you to have when trying to pay your tuition. You can request a spending limit increase at any time by calling 1-866-222-3456 24/7. Have a nice day! ^GH
